text: The Secret Life of Walter Mitty is an American adventure comedy-drama movie. It was directed by Ben Stiller, who also stars as the main character. The movie is based on James Thurber's 1939 short story of the same name. It was released on December 25, 2013. ==References== Category:2013 adventure movies Category:2013 comedy-drama movies Category:2010s American adventure movies Category:Movies based on short stories Category:20th Century Fox movies Category:Movies directed by Ben Stiller Category:Movies set in Iceland Category:Movies set in New York City
title: The Secret Life of Walter Mitty (2013 movie)
